description:
The course includes 10 individual lessons covering all information you will need to produce amazing video slideshow , After going through this entire course, students will have the skill to create and design video slideshow.

This course will learn you how to create video slideshow using images and video and also you can add sound effects , layer transition effects and more

You will learn -

- Creating video slideshow using images

- Creating video slideshow using videos

- Creating video slideshow using mixed images and videos

- Adding text effects

- Adding slide transition and animation

- Adding Background sound track

- Publish your video as single video file or burn on DVD or share on youtube

Take this course and know the best secrets in making amazing Video slideshows and video montage.

At the End of this course - Any one can make a video slideshow using images and videos and sound track then publish it as video file or burn it on video dvd or publish on youtube
title: Create video Slideshow and video montage
